page.title: 13LEISURE POOL-POLLOK, GLASGOW
page.content:
One of the main criticisms the children have of their area is the lack of indoor leisure facilities. A leisure pool for the area has been planned since l978. Despite public outcry work only began on the pool in September l984 and it will hopefully be completed before the end of l985.
The pool will be able to accommodate 25O bathers. Suspended above the pool will be a 54m long water slide which will fall into a separate sidepool. The poolside will have tropical plants, a cafe and a bar, and is estimated to cost somewhere in the region of Â£3.4m.
